item.title: Stricken
item.description: [[songs/s/symphony_x/iconoclast/when_all_is_lost.md#silent-pictures-speak-like-ghosts-in-the-machine-vyl-wnanory|You walk on like a woman in suffering]] [[songs/s/symphony_x/iconoclast/when_all_is_lost.md#silent-pictures-speak-like-ghosts-in-the-machine-vyl-wnanory|Won’t even bother now to tell me why]] [[songs/s/symphony_x/iconoclast/when_all_is_lost.md#silent-pictures-speak-like-ghosts-in-the-machine-vyl-wnanory|You come alone, letting all of us savor the moment]] [[songs/s/symphony_x/iconoclast/when_all_is_lost.
